description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部新闻司司长、外交部发言人、北美大洋洲司司长、中国驻印度尼西亚大使，现任中共中央对外联络部副部长。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, former Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Spokesperson, Director-General of the Department of North American and Oceanian Affairs, Ambassador to Indonesia, and currently a Vice Minister of the International Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会负责对外工作的职能部门。
description.en: The agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央对外联络部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the Minister of the International Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国驻印度尼西亚大使馆

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国驻印度尼西亚大使馆

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在印度尼西亚设立的外交代表机构。
description.en: The diplomatic mission of the People's Republic of China in Indonesia.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物和外交官，现任中共中央政治局委员、中央外事工作委员会办公室主任、外交部部长。
description.en: A Chinese politician and diplomat, currently a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee, Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission, and Minister of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部部长。
description.en: A Chinese diplomat who served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，陆慷的前任中国驻印度尼西亚大使。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, Lu Kang's predecessor as the Chinese Ambassador to Indonesia.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，陆慷的继任中国驻印度尼西亚大使。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, Lu Kang's successor as the Chinese Ambassador to Indonesia.

description.en: A department within the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China responsible for handling diplomatic affairs with countries and regions in North America and Oceania.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，陆慷的前任外交部北美大洋洲司司长。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, Lu Kang's predecessor as the Director-General of the Department of North American and Oceanian Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官，陆慷的继任外交部北美大洋洲司司长。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China, Lu Kang's successor as the Director-General of the Department of North American and Oceanian Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部内设机构，负责新闻发布和公共外交工作。
description.en: A department within the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China responsible for press releases and public diplomacy.

description.en: A Chinese diplomat, Lu Kang's successor as the Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政府与大不列颠及北爱尔兰联合王国政府就香港问题发表的联合声明。
description.en: The joint declaration signed by the governments of the People's Republic of China and the United Kingdom on the question of Hong Kong.

nodes.id: 英国外交及联邦事务部

zh-cn: 英国外交及联邦事务部

description.zh-cn: 英国政府负责外交与联邦事务的部门。
description.en: The UK government department responsible for foreign and Commonwealth affairs.

description.zh-cn: 指华为公司副董事长、首席财务官孟晚舟在加拿大被捕并引发的一系列国际争议事件。
description.en: Refers to the series of international controversies sparked by the arrest of Huawei's Vice Chairwoman and CFO, Meng Wanzhou, in Canada.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，华为公司副董事长、轮值董事长、首席财务官。
description.en: A Chinese business executive, who is the deputy chair of the board, rotating chair, and CFO of Huawei.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大外交官，曾任加拿大驻华大使。
description.en: A Canadian diplomat who served as the Canadian Ambassador to China.

position.zh-cn: 中共中央对外联络部副部长
position.en: Vice Minister of the International Department of the CCP Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 陆慷担任中共中央对外联络部副部长，部长为刘建超。
description.en: Lu Kang serves as the Vice Minister of the International Department of the CCP Central Committee, under Minister Liu Jianchao.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国驻印度尼西亚大使馆

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国驻印度尼西亚大使
position.en: Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to Indonesia

description.zh-cn: 陆慷担任驻印度尼西亚大使期间，王毅为外交部长。
description.en: During Lu Kang's tenure as Ambassador to Indonesia, Wang Yi served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs.

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国驻印度尼西亚大使
position.en: Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to Indonesia

description.zh-cn: 陆慷担任驻印度尼西亚大使期间，秦刚为外交部长。
description.en: During Lu Kang's tenure as Ambassador to Indonesia, Qin Gang served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 陆慷接替肖千出任中华人民共和国驻印度尼西亚大使。
description.en: Lu Kang succeeded Xiao Qian as the Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to Indonesia.

description.zh-cn: 王鲁彤接替陆慷出任中华人民共和国驻印度尼西亚大使。
description.en: Wang Lutong succeeded Lu Kang as the Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to Indonesia.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部北美大洋洲司

description.zh-cn: 陆慷接替丛培武出任中华人民共和国外交部北美大洋洲司司长。
description.en: Lu Kang succeeded Cong Peiwu as the Director-General of the Department of North American and Oceanian Affairs of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 杨涛接替陆慷出任中华人民共和国外交部北美大洋洲司司长。
description.en: Yang Tao succeeded Lu Kang as the Director-General of the Department of North American and Oceanian Affairs of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部新闻司

description.zh-cn: 陆慷接替刘建超出任中华人民共和国外交部新闻司司长。
description.en: Lu Kang succeeded Liu Jianchao as the Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 华春莹接替陆慷出任中华人民共和国外交部新闻司司长。
description.en: Hua Chunying succeeded Lu Kang as the Director-General of the Information Department of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

position.en: Counsellor and Deputy Head of Mission

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国驻美国大使馆

description.zh-cn: 陆慷作为外交部发言人时表示，《中英联合声明》作为一个历史文件，不具有任何现实意义，对中国中央政府对香港特区的管理也不具备任何约束力。
description.en: As the spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Lu Kang stated that the Sino-British Joint Declaration is a historical document that no longer has any practical significance and is not binding on the central government's management of the Hong Kong SAR.

relationships.source: 英国外交及联邦事务部

description.zh-cn: 回应陆慷的“失效论”，称《中英联合声明》与三十多年前签订时一样维持有效，是一份有法律拘束力的条约。
description.en: In response to Lu Kang's 'invalidity theory', it stated that the Sino-British Joint Declaration remains as valid today as when it was signed over 30 years ago and is a legally binding treaty.

description.zh-cn: 陆慷在接受加拿大《环球邮报》就孟晚舟事件专访时，为孟晚舟辩护，称加拿大是唯一配合美国要求拘押孟晚舟的国家。
description.en: In an interview with Canada's The Globe and Mail regarding the Meng Wanzhou incident, Lu Kang defended Meng, stating that Canada was the only country to comply with the U.S. request to detain her.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大前驻华大使赵朴在接受采访时，将陆慷形容为虚假消息专家，以回应陆慷关于孟晚舟事件的言论。
description.en: Former Canadian Ambassador to China Guy Saint-Jacques described Lu Kang as a disinformation expert in an interview, responding to Lu's comments on the Meng Wanzhou incident.
